Title: Painful Lessons
Description:
Magni appears stable for now, but he's still not responsive. We need to get him treatment quickly. I'll open a portal to Dalaran.

Follow us when you can.
RewardText:
I'm unsure why the Speaker of Azeroth would end up in such a state after attempting to... well, speak with Azeroth.

All we can do is wait for Magni to recover.
